name: ##Gladiator Beasts
author: Sork
notes: So finally made it to kog after coming back last month, didn't have time to make it last month because of new work but this is what I did it with. Electros were godlike, kuriboh was amazing VS AMA, and disappear single handedly won me games against phoenix and REZ. Overall very happy with how this deck performed and looking forward to the skill rebalancing
